The Weekend Wanders

WELCOME! We are an outdoor enthusiast LGBTQ couple, aspiring photographers and content creators who love to experience new adventures.

We're located in Florida and both work your typical 9-5 jobs. However, the weekends are our haven. We aim to encourage you to spend more time in the outdoors, seek out unique places to stay, hidden gems to discover and check off bucket list experiences! We focus on connecting to like-minded people who enjoy all types of travel. 

We have two dogs, Remy and Rico who come on our adventures when possible. Our goal is to travel and explore all the National Parks, live a sustainable and healthy lifestyle.

We're so glad you're here and can't wait to connect more with you!

-Tara and Brittany

"So much of who we are is where we have been."

- William Langewische

Services

Photography

Looking to get some new photos of your short term rental (AirBnb, VRBO) or brand? With our professional gear, we can provide high resolution images to help increase bookings and sales. **Drone images and videography also available.**

Influencer Marketing

In the age of social media, it's all about reaching a larger audience and getting in front of an audience you may not have tapped into yet! Images with a subject help potential guests picture themselves there & actually perform 30% better than posts without a subject! We have a strong connection in multiple communities that can help boost your brand and/or place! Let's work on building a mutually beneficial relationship for both our audiences.
